attributes.title: hell no❤️
attributes.review: when i first opened the app i was greeted by this disgusting orange faced man i strongly felt very disturbed by this image but still continued to navigate the app. EVEN more pictures of this gross orange faced cheeto looking man popped up. this made me feel even more insecure and uncomfortable. i also strongly dislike the way this app was organized it was very irrelevant. this app has no sense of humor and terrorizes my eyes with pictures of that man. this half orange and half monkey man seems very mysterious and gives me a very bad vibe. his slogan saying make america great again was very hypocritical. knowing the fact that this man is racist, doesn’t support equality, has done very inappropriate things to underaged women, makes his own son feel very uncomfortable, and MANY more things. i really find this app VERY discomforting and very self centered on this orange man. i feel like this app should me used as a platform for everyone and not just this orange man. this app was also very hard to navigate as well. i didn’t know where to go and wherever i clicked, pictures of this orange man would pop up out of literally no where. what traumatizes me more is that some pictures he has his fist in the air. i think he has a mental problem because there is no one near him who is harming him. he also seems to be talking very loudly in some pictures which makes me feel like he really does need a therapist or a psych consult or even trauma therapy. the trauma being himself from all of the horrible things this orange man has done to this country. i STRONGLY DONT recommend this app to ANYONE. america deserves better than this orange man and a brick wall. thank you and goodbye.

i downloaded this app in hopes of staying in formed and find rallies near me. first of all, the app took 4 months to download. once i was finally able to get on the app it started screaming insults at me! not to mention my eyes began to steam and deteriorate as a saw a picture of a giant rotting cheeto on the screen. i tried to delete it but it wouldn’t let me. it told me that seize my toe nail clippings and feed them to my uncle. once i was finally able to delete it i felt relived. until one night the app started yelling insults at me once again. i was terrified considering i had already deleted it. my phone then morphed into a cheeto. THE APP GAVE MY PHONE A VIRUS. the cheeto then chased me around my house until i finally snuck behind it and locked it in a cooler. i traveled near and far to every technology store and no one could help. until one day i met a creepy old man a bus stop saying he could help me. he wore a large coat and i could barely even see his face. he took me to a lair of some sort in his house and told me to set the cooler on the table, so i did. but that’s when he locked the door as i turned my back to him in order to set the cheeto on the table. i heard the lock click. he had locked me in there for two weeks until i used my last toe nail clipping to carve a hole through the large brick wall. i then managed to slip myself through the hole when DONALD TRUMP HIMSELF UNLOCKED THE DOOR AND CAME IN. i peeked through the hole i created, after i had wiggles myself outside. he then saw me and unleashed the mini cheeto, that use to be my phone. i ran and ran, while trump and the rest of his cheeto army ran after me until i hopped on a boat barely making it away. TRUMP HAD KIDNAPPED ME. this never would have happened if i didn’t download the app. i’m still on the run from this man so DO NOT DOWNLOAD unless you want to have the same experience as i did.

This is for Trump 🤡you big f*t white n*sty smelly f*t b**ch. 🤢Why you tryna ban TikTok? 😪That’s my only source of living 😳you trifling dirty 🤬white racist 🧚🏻a** big f*t b**ch.🙅‍♀️ oompaloopa body 🍊a** b**tch👹
